lender.name: Zachary
lender.loan_because:
"May God bless you with discomfort At easy answers, half truths, and superficial relationships, So that you may live deep within your heart.
May God bless you with anger At injustice, oppression, and exploitation of people, So that you may work for justice, freedom, and peace.
May God bless you with tears To shed for those who suffer pain, rejection, hunger, and war, So that you may reach out your hand to comfort them and to turn their pain to joy.
And may God bless you with enough foolishness To believe that you can make a difference in the world, So that you can do what others claim cannot be done, To bring justice and kindness to all our children and the poor. Amen" -A Franciscan benediction
lender.occupational_info: Originally from the Bay Area, I go to school at Westmont College in Santa Barbara, CA, US.

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: I had helping hands that got me to where I am today. Now I'm in a position to pass the help forward.

lender.name: Steve_Iman

lender.occupational_info: Building teams and organizations. Helping managers make progress at creating good working conditions for people in order that their business might benefit

lender.name: Jade
lender.loan_because: I want to help. I can only help financially. I'm against begging as it doesn't fix anything. Helping someone get started with a business will inevitably help them to not only help themselves, but to help others in their immediate community. Which is not only wonderful, but also isn't feeding the cycle of begging. Somehow, my wealth, and luck in life can be transported to other places on the planet, and like a seed it can grown into luck and prosper for someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I help people with their problems with computers, telephones, internet and email.

lender.occupational_info: I am a CPA (certified public accountant) and investment advisor. I work with families and small business to help them define and achieve their goals, and to effectively manage their finances.

lender.occupational_info: I started a small software company in Spain. We write computer programs for big companies.

lender.name: Quillan
lender.loan_because: I am an informal student of Classical Liberalism and Austrian Economics, that is, free and border-less markets as the only logical path to peace. This position was concluded by having read numerous books by such writers; Mises, Bastiat, Menger, Rothbard, Nock, Hayek, Smith, Hazlitt, Friedman, Rockwell, Hoppe, Woods, etc. I joined this site due to reading Dambisa Moyo's book Dead Aid. In it she refers to this project by name and website.... Una cita del libro "La Ley" por Claude Frdric Bastiat (1801-1850); La existencia de la Personalidad, la Libertad y la Propiedad, no se debe a que los hombres hayan dictado Leyes. Por el contrario, la preexistencia de su personalidad, libertad y propiedad es la que determina que puedan hacer leyes los hombres.
lender.occupational_info: I am a poet/writer, just finished my 6th book "Midland"... Peace is always a choice... La paz es una eleccin siempre...... Photography by Megan Carlson-Reed.

lender.name: Commercial Carts, Inc.
lender.occupational_info: I own a retail and wholesale preventative maintenance company, which provides on-site shopping cart and backroom equipment repair. We install cart corrals as well as provide parking lot care.

lender.loan_because: It is great to be able to use some of my wealth helping others in this way. And practicing generosity is good for my soul.

lender.loan_because: Boarders are just lines on a map.

lender.loan_because: This is the best way I know of to help out people in developing countries.
lender.occupational_info: I have my own business taking photographs, mostly for local government, schools and businesses. It is a very enjoyable way of making a living.

lender.name: they
lender.loan_because: no deposit casino bonus, gambling, bonuses, casino
lender.occupational_info: Bonuses are part of our lives like this no deposit casino bonus has to be!

lender.name: LIN
lender.loan_because: I want to help those dream-searcher make their dreams come true!!

lender.name: Hannes & Meagan
lender.loan_because: I think its a wonderful idea, and we all have enough to give back to people in need, Bravo Kiva !
lender.occupational_info: i manage/design/develop infrastructure around the world

lender.name: Tony
lender.loan_because: My children gave me a $2500 credit as a father's day gift.
lender.occupational_info: Parish volunteer, homeless shelter volunteer, singer of songs with anyone who will join.

lender.name: Donogh
lender.loan_because: of the warm fuzzy feeling I get from helping someone halfway across the world and because Kiva makes economic sense!
lender.occupational_info: I work for an Irish software company that helps small to mid-sized retailers in the US sell online

lender.name: Stewart
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I support the efforts of people to improve their own lives.
lender.occupational_info: I help out with office work, order books and answer the phones at a book wholesaler.

lender.name: Larry
lender.loan_because: I believe in the principle of ~ "give and it shall be given unto you"~
lender.occupational_info: Independent Contractor, transporting vehicles nationwide with over sixteen years of experience. Currently serving individuals, dealers, dealerships and auto brokers throughout the U.S.

lender.name: Derek
lender.loan_because: Well as they say - If I have a few spare bob, now and again , may as well put it to some good use - plus I like the idea of a relatively small amount of money helping people to secure their livelihoods and their familys' futures.....

lender.name: davide
lender.loan_because: butchers
lender.occupational_info: make money by typing on a keyboard

lender.name: Nishan
lender.loan_because: I believe people can share among themselves and when they do they change the world a little.

lender.name: Stacey
lender.occupation: Hospital Development- Organ and Tissue Donation

lender.name: Ellie
lender.loan_because: I've been given a lot of opportunities in life. I'd like to give some back.
lender.occupational_info: I type summaries about treatment and surgeries for doctors in hospitals.

lender.name: Edward
lender.loan_because: I have spent my professional career helping entrepreneurs achieve their goals by investing in good businesses, formed in the image of their dreams and aspirations. While most of my investing has been to those with world-class educations and business experience, I strongly believe everyone, at every social and economic level, deserves a chance to prosper based on their unique abilities, hard work, discipline and courage.
lender.occupational_info: I am an investor who seeks out new ideas and smart people who simply need cash to help them achieve their vision of the future for themselves and their families. I am a Managing Director at a private equity firm in Dallas, Texas and finance businesses to help them grow and become more profitable in the future. I provide strategic guidance and operational advice on the most efficient and effective methods to achieve revenue and profitability growth.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I believe micro-lending is vital, effecient and necessary in today's world economy.

lender.name: Karla
lender.loan_because: I think it's important that we all have an opportunity to create work to support our families.
lender.occupational_info: I work with the seafood industry and teach an internationally based food safety system that allows firms to sell seafood globally.

lender.name: David & Patty
lender.loan_because: what we can do to help one will hopefully help all. The world is a small place and we are all connected.

lender.name: Sadie
lender.occupation: I am a high school student

lender.name: Darren
lender.loan_because: I have a life that allows me to support others. Can = will.
lender.occupational_info: I work to allow those who can't hear have equal access to information.

lender.name: Red Bunny
lender.loan_because: I can and I want to.
lender.occupational_info: Love and Peace! Peace and Love! Hoppity hop hop

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: I want to help people around the world improve themselves, their families and their countries. If you work hard you deserve a chance to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I program computers to help people make a living.

lender.name: Carrolls
lender.loan_because: we believe in the micro loan concept and are happy that our small amounts can help.

lender.name: Steve & Emmy
lender.loan_because: We believe that everyone should have a chance to create a better life for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: We create artwork for video games.

lender.name: The Coopsters
lender.loan_because: We love to see others dreams of having their own business grow and flourish
lender.occupational_info: We are four moms who rent a store, sell our goods and offer space for a small fee to others who want to grow their small business. We also offer workshops and events to our Community

lender.name: Mohamed N
lender.loan_because: I HAVE A FRIEND WHO IS IN NEED TO CHANGE HIS LIFE AND HE NEEDS HELP TO DO THAT. AS A MOUSLEN MAN I FOUND MYSELF RESPONSIBLE ABOUT THAT FRIEND WHO I AM SURE IS VERY HONEST AND WILLING TO BE BETTER. ALSO I HAVE HOPE TO HELP OTHER FRIENDS IN KIVA WHO ARE AT THE SAME CONDITION AS MY FRIEND.
lender.occupational_info: I AM WORKING IN TEACHING IN EGYPTIAN UNIVERSITY. I GET IN TOUCH WITH MANY STUDENTS AND GRADUATE FRIENDS. MANY OF THEN NEED A SINGLE CHANCE TO CHANGE THEIR LIVES. I ADVICE THEM BUT FEEL SHY TO OFFER MONYWISE HELP AND SOMETIMES I DONT HAVE MUCH MONY AS THEY NEED. KIVA IS GREAT OPORTUNITY TO HELP NICE PEOPLE WITHOUT GIVING THEM SHAME.

lender.name: Karl
lender.loan_because: Entrepreneurship is the best way to eradicate poverty and uplift humanity to its true potential
lender.occupational_info: I help others to achieve their dreams and full potential and in that process I'm getting closer to mine!
